title: Executive Order on Ensuring Responsible Development of Digital Assets
summary: Framework for responsible development of digital assets including cryptocurrencies, CBDCs, and blockchain technology
compliance_requirements: Financial institutions must report digital asset transactions over $10000

title: General Data Protection Regulation
summary: Comprehensive data protection and privacy regulation for EU residents
compliance_requirements: Data protection officer required for large organizations, privacy by design mandatory

title: California Consumer Privacy Act
summary: California state privacy law giving consumers rights over personal information
compliance_requirements: Businesses with $25M+ revenue or 50000+ consumers must comply

title: Sarbanes-Oxley Act
summary: Corporate accountability and financial reporting requirements
compliance_requirements: Public companies must maintain internal controls and CEO/CFO certification

title: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
summary: Healthcare privacy and security requirements for protected health information
compliance_requirements: Healthcare providers must implement administrative, physical, and technical safeguards

title: Communications Decency Act Section 230
summary: Internet platform liability protection for third-party content
compliance_requirements: Platforms not liable for user-generated content but must moderate in good faith

title: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
summary: Security standards for organizations handling credit card information
compliance_requirements: Annual compliance validation required for merchants processing card payments

title: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act
compliance_requirements: Schools must obtain consent before disclosing student records
